SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, MIN(price_discount) as price_discount from items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name LIKE '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts DESC
tempSpec.price_discount ASC
i.item_name ASC
